info.+content: After years of development, Burton and Berecca—a team of scientists working for the World Ninja Association—finish the Ninja-Gum, a tool which can strengthen the powers of Ninja descendants. However, this success comes with a catch: the gum transforms the two into children, and their research is promptly stolen away from them. Looking to turn themselves back, the two sneak into WNA Academy, where they make friends with other Ninja, encounter extraterrestrial lifeforms, and get mixed up in conspiracies centered around the Ninja-Gum.
#1: "Maybe Baby" (メイビーベイビー) by Kyary Pamyu Pamyu (eps 1-40)
#2: "Isshin Doutai" (一心同体; One Heart, One Body) by Kyary Pamyu Pamyu (eps 41-112)
#1: "Ninja Like Ninja" (ニンジャライクニンジャ) by Wolpis Carter (eps 1-19)
#3: "Yūjō-teki Kōshin" (友情的行進; Friendly March) by Fantastic☆Paisen (eps 39-57)
#4: "Ninja Remotion!" (ニンジャリモーション！) by Ange☆Reve (eps 58-65)
#5: "Radice" (ラディーチェ) by Wolpis Carter (eps 66-79)
#6: "Appare! Extreme Ninja" (天晴れ！エクストリーム忍者; Well Done! Extreme Ninja) by SHARE LOCK HOMES (eps 80-100)
#7: "Hakuchū Kimi to Doron" (白昼きみとドロン; Taking Off with You in the Day) by Pop Shinanaide (eps 101-124)
#8: "TKG Syndrome" (TKGシンドローム; Rice & Eggs Syndrome) by Miyu Kaneko (eps 125-148)
#9: "Night Before A Dance" (ないとびふぉあーだんす) by Panda Dragon (eps 149-172)
#10: "Kesara Basara" (ケサラバサラ) by Yuko Suzuhana (eps 173-)
ニンジャラ テレビ東京アニメ公式
